text:
Docker (https://www.docker.com) is currently hiring for the following full-time technical positions:

In San Francisco:

- Sr. Director for Docker Hub

- Go Engineers

- Python Engineers (Django or Twisted)

- Infrastructure/ DevOps

- Frontend (React.js)

- UX Engineer

In London:

- Engineering Manager (Open-source, Machine & Compose)

See full list of job opportunities here:

https://www.docker.com/company/careers/

If interested in any of these positions, please send an email

to jobs@docker.com
